law.catch_line: If a deficiency exists, the Secretary may impose sanctions that include:...

text.section: A civil money penalty may be imposed when a deficiency exists or an ongoing pattern of deficiencies exists in a nursing home.

Upon determination by the Department that a deficiency or deficiencies exist, the Department shall notify the nursing home that:
Unless corrective action taken pursuant to this section is substantially completed, a civil money penalty will be imposed; or
An order imposing a civil money penalty will be issued, pursuant to § 19-1403 of this subtitle which shall include a list of all deficiencies and notice that a civil money penalty may be imposed until the time that the cited deficiencies have been rectified.
